findings.details: Blog list entries lack a hover/focus surface to improve scanability and affordance on desktop and keyboard navigation.
Manual scan of repo links did not reveal placeholder URLs (e.g., example.com).
Pages include descriptions/keywords and global SEO tags; no immediate gaps found in primary layouts.
Typography and spacing are consistent; could further emphasize blog list focus states for scanning.

recommendations: Add a hover/focus surface on blog list entries to improve scanability and keyboard navigation
Continue periodic link audits for news sources
